header.title: CRISIS DATA
header.subtitle: Funding Compass
header.betaTooltip: This beta version is based on publicly available information from the respective organizations and transparency portals like IATI. Updates are ongoing. If you have any feedback, please use the form in the upper right corner.

dataProviders.title: Who receives funds
dataProviders.label: Organizations
dataProviders.tooltip: Organizations in the crisis data ecosystem who maintain essential assets.

dataProjects.title: What funds are used for
dataProjects.label: Assets
dataProjects.tooltip: Essential assets that enable partners to anticipate, prevent, and respond to crises around the world.

donorCountries.title: Where funds are from
donorCountries.label: Donors
donorCountries.tooltip: Key donors in the crisis data ecosystem who provide funding to maintain essential assets.

ui.chartFootnote: Note: A project can be assigned to multiple types.

modals.organizationNotFoundMessage: The requested organization could not be found.
modals.projectNotFoundMessage: The requested project could not be found.
modals.budgetInfoTooltip: This Data was extracted from publicly available sources and collected by the Complex Risk Analytics Fund (CRAF'd). It may not reflect the most current information.
modals.notesInsights: All insights are based on publicly accessible information and data.
modals.notesUn: For simplification, donors were limited to the 30 highest contributors to UN organizations. Therefore, some donors may not be displayed.
modals.notesProjectDonors: Project donor countries may differ from organization-level donor countries.
modals.clickToFilterByType: Click to filter by this investment type
